articles.title: Over 300 Stocks Doubled in 2025!
articles.summary: Motley Fool: Over 300 Stocks Doubled in 2025!. 2025 has been an above-average year for stocks. And over 300 publicly traded companies have increased in value by 100% or more. This has our team asking the question: Which of these upward moves are legit and which could be doomed to revert back in 2026?
